item.title: Pic
item.description:
flowchart TD
    Needs_Assessment -.-> System_Design
    System_Design -.-> Implementation
    Implementation -.-> Data_Collection
    Data_Collection -.-> Results_Feedback
    Results_Feedback -.-> System_Scaling

    subgraph Needs_Assessment
        direction TB
        A1[Identify Rabies Epidemic in Guangxi] --> A2[Confirm Vaccine Shortages & Data Delays]
        A2 --> A3[Community Feedback & Health Department Data]
    end

    subgraph System_Design
        direction TB
        B1[Design Mobile-Based Reporting System] --> B2[Develop Application: Java & Smartphone Support]
        B2 --> B3[Modules: Data Entry, Vaccine Usage, Bite Case Reporting]
        B3 --> B4[User-Friendly Forms: Multiple Choice, Dropdown Menus]
    end

    subgraph Implementation
        direction TB
        C1[Deploy in Key Hospitals & Veterinary Sites] --> C2[Train Health & Veterinary Staff]
        C2 --> C3[Distribute Configured Mobile Devices]
        C3 --> C4[Pilot Testing in Selected Areas]
    end

    subgraph Data_Collection
        direction TB
        D1[Real-Time Data Collection via Mobile App] --> D2[SMS Reminders for PEP Vaccination]
        D2 --> D3[Automatic Report Generation for CDC & Local Health Departments]
    end

    subgraph Results_Feedback
        direction TB
        E1[Analyze Data: Vaccination Rates & Rabies Incidence] --> E2[Collect User Feedback via Surveys or SMS]
        E2 --> E3[Adjust Vaccine Distribution & Public Awareness Strategies]
    end

    subgraph System_Scaling
        direction TB
        F1[Expand to Other High-Risk Provinces: Guizhou, Yunnan] --> F2[Integrate with China CDC for Data Sharing]
        F2 --> F3[Adapt to 5G & Advanced Smartphone Technologies]
    end

item.title: Math
item.description:
行内数学公式：$a^2 + b^2 = c^2$。

块公式，

$$ a^2 + b^2 = c^2 $$

item.title: Spring Boot Web 框架学习
item.description:
1. 为什么要使用 Spring Web？

Spring Web 是 Spring 框架中的一个模块，用于简化 Web 应用开发，特别是 REST API 和 MVC（Model-View-Controller）架构。使用 Spring Web 的主要原因有：
